original_title: 彼女が旅行で不在の間、彼女の幼馴染と朝から晩までひたすらハメまくった48時間の記録 三上悠亜

title: While My Girlfriend Was Away On Vacation, I Was Fucking Her Childhood Friend From Morning Until Night A 48-Hour Video Record Of My Infidelity Yua Mikami
